scripts.dev: cd src/Astroid.Web && NODE_ENV=development dotnet watch run
scripts.db-migrate: dotnet ef migrations add --project src/Astroid.Entity/ --startup-project src/Astroid.Web/
scripts.db-migrate-list: dotnet ef migrations list --project src/Astroid.Entity/ --startup-project src/Astroid.Web/
scripts.db-update: dotnet ef database update --project src/Astroid.Entity/ --startup-project src/Astroid.Web/
scripts.db-migrate-rm: dotnet ef migrations remove --project src/Astroid.Entity/ --startup-project src/Astroid.Web/
